newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech Komercni raises ref rate to 12.3pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech Komercni raises ref rate to 12.3pct.

text.p: The largest Czech commercial bank, Komercni Banka a.s. said on Tuesday it would raise its key lending rate, the reference rate, to 12.3 percent from 12.05 with effect from May 14.
"Because of the upward movement of interest rates on the interbank money deposit market, Komercni Banka is changing its reference rate," Komercni said in a statement.
Komercni last changed its reference rate on May 5 when it was cut to 12.05 from 12.25 percent.
